testcase.name: Verify new customer can be created
testcase.system-out: Given User login to Guru99 Bank with "mngr201145" and "urEpUta".............passed When Title of login page is Guru99 Bank Manager Homepage displays "mngr201145".passed Then Click to New Customer on the left menu.................................passed Then Enter valid values to all field to add a New Customer "Loc Nguyen", "male", "01-23-1983", "Nguyen Van Dau Binh Thanh", "HCM", "VN", "123456", "0909999999", "@aaa.com", "12345678".passed Then See the Customer Registered Successfully message.......................passed Then Verify the correctness of Customer Registered "Loc Nguyen", "male", "01-23-1983", "Nguyen Van Dau Binh Thanh", "HCM", "VN", "123456", "0909999999", "@aaa.com", "12345678".passed

testcase.name: Verify to create new account based on the customer just created above
testcase.system-out: Given Login with "mngr201145" and "urEpUta" and navigate to New Account.....passed When Add new account page is loaded.........................................passed Then Enter valid values to create new account "Current", "11000"............passed Then Verify new account information "Loc Nguyen", "Current", "11000"........passed

testcase.name: Verify deposit function work fine with the account just created.
testcase.system-out: Given Login with "mngr201145" and "urEpUta" and navigate to Deposit.........passed When Deposit page is loaded.................................................passed Then Enter valid values for deposit "1000", "test desc".....................passed Then Verify deposit information "1000", "test desc".........................passed
